altTitles.en: วุ่นรักสลับวิญญาณ

description.en:
This story tells of a high school student named Sia. In the school, there are two of them who are named Sia; one is a popular student who has everything and looks perfect, whereas the other Sia is a quiet person who often gets bullied by her classmates.  
One day they were met with an accident which resulted in both experiencing critical conditions. In this critical condition, both were destined to exchange bodies for three months. What happens after three months? Will they return to their respective bodies? Curious? Read the story to find out what happens!

altTitles.th: เซียนเกม นอกจอ

description.en:
What if your life is just like playing a game? What if you can upgrade your status and gain more levels? A fantasy world is coming right at you!  
  
Han Jee-Han, a normal high school student, suddenly develops a special power where his entire world is shifted into a game-like setting. He can see the power levels of people, look at the stats of a seemingly normal item, get abilities, and even level up! Follow Han Jee-Han as he discovers how to use this power, and maybe even where it came from.
description.fr:

description.ru:
Обычным дням школьной жизни пришёл конец с тех пор, как, из-за сильных пристрастий к MMORPG и другим компьютерным играм, обычный игроман и посредственный ученик Хан Чжи Хан был одарён «богиней Геей» сверхъестественным даром под ироничным названием «Игрок». Теперь он стал игровым персонажем в реальной жизни и может прокачивать уровень, тем самым повышая свои навыки так, как сам того желает. Только из-за этого «дара свыше» он оказался втянут в Бездну, мир полный сверхъестественных созданий и опасностей, которые будут преследовать его. По этой причине герой должен максимально быстро качать свой уровень и изучать новые способности, чтобы противостоять тем, кто попытается ему навредить, так как в Бездне это обычное явление. Но, к счастью, его лучший друг уже давно является частью Бездны и всеми силами помогает ему не умереть раньше времени. А вот что ждёт героя впереди, к чему приведёт его судьба и воля Геи, какова будет его роль в Бездне и чего он сможет добиться в познании своих сил, мы увидим в его дальнейших приключениях.

description.zh-hk:
平凡的高中生韓志漢從某個瞬間開始像是在玩線上角色扮演遊戲一樣看得見周圍每個人的頭頂上都標記著的特技和等級，甚至連幫忙跑腿的工作也變成像在遊戲中執行任務的模式，然後突然間他真的像從遊戲裡走出來的人一樣擁有了神奇的超能力并且能夠和其他玩家戰鬥，他的人生開始變成了一場遊戲。 日本的《刀劍神域》將原本電腦遊戲中的規則套入了玩家們的現實生活中，而《遊俠》這部作品則將主角原本平凡無奇的人生變得像遊戲一樣夢幻神奇，主角擁有了可以看到其他人的能力值和等級的能力後，他開始慢慢地開發自己的技能及等級，過程中也享受到彷彿在遊戲裡『練功』的樂趣。

title.en: I'm Really Not the Evil God's Lackey

altTitles.en: I'm Really Not the Demon God's Lackey
I’m Really Not the Devil’s Lackey

altTitles.uk: Насправді я не слуга Злого Бога

altTitles.vi: Ta Thật Không Phải Tà Thần Chó Săn

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”

title.en: Because Janitor-san Is Not a Hero

altTitles.ja: 用務員さんは勇者じゃありませんので

altTitles.ja-ro: Yomuin-san wa Yuusha ja Arimasenno de

description.en: A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isn’t a student or the homeroom teacher… it’s the janitor.
description.ru:
Школьный уборщик Хасэбэ Курандо переносится в другой мир с помощью заклинания, вызывающего героев. Вместе с 78 другими учениками и учителями, которые также были призваны, Бог наделил его особыми способностями, чтобы он смог выжить в суровом мире в качестве героя... В разгар телепортации силу Курандо неожиданно крадёт ученик, и он остается в пучине отчаяния без посторонней помощи.
— Верни мне мою силу. Раз так, я хочу оказаться в безлюдном месте, где не придется иметь с ними дело... В ярости, Курандо умоляет Бога отправить его подальше от людей, одного в сильный холод . Но это лишь начало его приключений...

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Some parents give their kids an inheritance. Some give their kids a car. Jinwon's parents gave him… a motel. And not even a great one. Rundown and in need of massive repairs, the Ballantine Motel used to be a golden goose. But, of course, a drunk driver running his car through the entrance tends to change things.  
  
So when Jinwon takes over, he makes some upgrades and additions. And while "Ballantine" is a nice name, it's a bit long. So, of course, he makes the obvious choice and shortens it. The BL Motel is the neighborhood's newest addition. Of course, now all Jinwon needs is some new help and maybe find out why so many gay couples have started visiting. Then again, when life give you lemons, you lean in and stock the vending machines with lube.

description.en:
Kouya is reunited with Manaki, a girl he used to play with when they were little, for the first time in nine years.
Even though they've lived far apart, Kouya's feelings for her have been growing through their social media exchanges, and he decided to take the opportunity of their reunion to reveal his feelings to her!
But she has a secret...?
description.ja:
小さいころ一緒によく遊んでいた女の子・愛姫と9年ぶりに再会できることになった耕弥。
離れていても、SNSでのやりとりで彼女に想いを募らせていった耕弥は、再会を機に想いを打ち明けることに！
しかし彼女にはある秘密があって…!?

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

description.en:
"That's the first time I've seen crying so beautiful."  
  
Tajima finds himself taken in by Koga's crying face – but little did he know, the reason behind those tears was the death of his goldfish at the hand of Tajima's cat, Buuta. While figuring out how to apologize for that, he stumbles across a secret of Koga's.
description.tr: “İlk defa bu kadar güzel ağlandığını görüyorum.” Tajima, kendisini Koga’nın ağlayan yüzü tarafından ele geçirilmiş bulur, ancak kendisi çok az şey biliyordu, bu gözyaşlarının ardındaki neden, Japon balığının Tajima’nın kedisinin (Buuta) yüzünden ölmesiydi. Bunun için nasıl özür dileyeceğini düşünürken, Koga’nın bir sırrına rastlar.

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

altTitles.es: Esa gal de Hokkaido es demasiado linda

description.en: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!
description.es:
Tsubasa es un chico que se va vivir desde Tokyo a Hokkaido en pleno invierno porque han trasladado a su padre. En su antiguo instituto no era nada popular y se metían con él siempre que podían. Dispuesto a empezar una nueva vida, llega en taxi entre un paisaje nevado y se baja a las primeras de cambio pensando que ya ha llegado.

Pero pronto se da cuenta de que en Hokkaido las cosas son diferentes que en la gran ciudad y aquí las distancias son mucho mayores, así que el sitio al que iba está a tres horas andando: eso significa que se ha quedado tirado en medio de la nieve. El impacto es mayor cuando se encuentra con Minami Fuyuki, una chica vestida como la típica gal pese al frío que hace.

Minami no sólo es guapa, sino que es una chica supermaja y con las maneras de una gal, un crush instantáneo para Tsubasa, aunque el combo de gal más chica de pueblo lo deja bastante perplejo y más cuando se entera de que van al mismo instituto. Gracias a Minami podrá integrarse bastante rápido y conocer a otras gals, aunque el choque cultural a varios niveles está servido. ¡Sus días de gals, frío y diversión acaban de empezar!
description.fr:
Natsukawa Tsubasa vient de déménager de Tokyo à Hokkaido, en plein hiver. Ne se rendant pas compte de la réalité des distances à la campagne, il se retrouve perdu à 3 heures de marche de sa destination. Mais il fait également la rencontre d’une Dosanko (« née et élevée à Hokkaido ») gyaru, en minijupe par – 8°C !  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ikada_kai) | [Author's YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-U4OJu-cEF2VlnM61B77bQ) | [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/21326958)
description.ru:
Нацукава Цубаса только что переехал из Токио на Хоккайдо.  Не имея представления, о том какое большое расстояние между населёнными пунктами в захолустье он решил выйти из такси в соседнем городе, посреди зимы. Однако он был шокирован узнав, что до соседнего города идти целых 3 часа. Тут же он встречает Досанко-гяру (родом из Хоккайдо) по имени Фуюки Минами, которая при минус 8 градусах цельсия ходит в стандартной одежде гяру: короткой юбке и с голыми ногами.  


---
description.tr: Liseli Tsubasa, Hokkaido’daki Kitami şehrine taşınır ve oradaki bir otobüs durağında bir "gyaru" ile tanışır. Dondurucu soğuğa rağmen çıplak bacaklarıyla beyaz kar manzarasının karşısında tek başına durduğunu görmek kalbini cezbeder.
description.pt-br: Shiki Tsubasa acaba de se mudar de Tóquio para Hokkaido no meio do inverno. Sem perceber a distância entre as cidades do país, ele desce do táxi na cidade mais próxima de seu destino para poder ver os pontos turísticos ao redor de sua casa, mas fica chocado quando descobre que a "próxima cidade" é uma a três horas a pé. No entanto, ele também conhece uma linda Dosanko (nascido e criado em Hokkaido) gyaru chamado Fuyuki Minami, que está enfrentando um clima de 8 graus Celsius abaixo de 0 com a roupa gyaru padrão de saias curtas e pernas nuas!

description.en:
“Who am I?!”  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the “God of Blackfield,” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

“I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”

Revived three years later, this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!
description.pt-br: "Quem sou eu?" A lenda da Legião Estrangeira Francesa, 'Kang Chan'! Durante a guerra Africana, ele era chamado de 'Rei do Blackfield', o deus da terra negra, o qual os seus inimigos tinham temor e medo. Porém, durante uma missão para matar Masallan, o cérebro por trás do SISS, o grupo de defensores sunitas, Kang Chan foi morto em combate por um tiro vindo de trás dele. Enquanto sua visão embaçava, ele viu os treze membros de seu batalhão, que tinham absoluta fé nele, sendo mortos um após o outro. Enquanto Kang Chan aguardava a morte depois de ter sido atingido por um traidor, ele foi salvo por um poder misterioso e acordou 3 anos depois na Coréia do Sul. Contudo, ele estava no corpo de outro 'Kang Chan', um garoto de 19 anos no ensino médio que era ameaçado na escola. A jornada de Kang Chan para conseguir se vingar do traidor e descobrir a verdade por trás do seu renascimento começa agora!

description.en:
Sasha becomes a spy after losing everything in the war. She was found by John, the leader of the war and a demon officer with the face of an angel, but…! The spy is caught by the enemy country and becomes a double agent!

---

**Links:**
[Official English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/the-double-agent)
description.pt-br: Sasha se torna uma espiã depois de perder tudo na guerra. Ela foi encontrada por John, o líder da guerra e um oficial demoníaco com rosto de anjo, mas ...! O espião é capturado pelo país inimigo e se torna um agente duplo!

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

description.en:
Jang Young-guk’, who achieved great success as a supporting actor.
Received the first and honorable Best Supporting Actor Award at the Acting Awards.

However, on that day, his mother passed away…

Horrified by the death of his mother, whom he neglected for years, Young-guk decided to end his life…

Before his death, he longingly recalled the warmth of his mother and the peaceful memories of the past. He regretted turning his back on those memories…

At that moment, he suddenly regressed to his childhood…

“I regressed, to that past I missed”

“As an inescapable fact, this life is just…”

Once again, the story of a person who wants to live as an actor begins.
Will he be able to live a happy life unlike the previous life?

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
description.ja:
**もっと知りたい きみのこと**
高校1年生・瀬野湊（せのみなと）。新学期早々に担任の教師から頼まれたのは、となりの席でいつも寝ている猫実（ねこざね）さんのこと。超人見知り&引っ込み思案な性格な瀬野…。会話どころか顔すら見たことがない猫実さんを勇気を出して起こそうとしたら、急に彼女から抱きつかれて――!?友達未満なふたりが紡ぐ、無自覚ラブコメ開幕♪

altTitles.ja: いとこのお姉ちゃんに甘えちゃう？

altTitles.en: I'll Be Spoiled by My Big Sis Cousin?

description.en:
***A heart-pounding new life together with my "big sis cousin"!?***

Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. 
Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
A slightly naughty, living together romcom begins under one roof!!

(Source: Ultra Jump)

---

Serialization published in Ultra Jump starting in the June 2024 issue, released on May 17th, 2024.
description.ja:
セクシーすぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”とドキドキ新生活！？

高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった大泉将人。
そこには距離感が近すぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”が居て……!?
一つ屋根の下、ちょっぴりHな同居ラブコメディ開幕!!
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

description.en: Freshly graduated, urban girl Minami got admitted to an ideal company -- large and famous for food products, located at the center of Tokyo. Everything was going so smoothly until she got assigned to a remote cattle farm in Hokkaido. There she must learn everything of raising cattle from scratch.
description.ja: 都心で働くことに憧れていた南は食品メーカーに就職する。だが配属先は北海道の畜産牧場だった。着いた早々脱走した牛に出会い気絶してしまう。慣れないことに戸惑いながらも真剣に働く仲間たちに南も少しずつ感化されていく。本格畜産牧場ストーリー。

altTitles.ja: ビー・バップ・ハイスクール

description.en:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**

Ryeodam, an older idol who was a trainee for a long time, usually browses through fan community content. Although he's not popular, he remains in his group because of his one-sided crush on his teammate Jinwon. After browsing for a while, Ryeodam comes across fanfiction about him and Jinwon, gets turned on, and masturbates in the bathroom. However afterwards, Jinwon, of all people, returns and discovers the fanfiction. "What's this?" "I was just looking at it." "But, Ryeodam hyung, aren't you curious?" "About what?" "Sex between men." Whaaat?! Ryeodam, whose heart almost stopped for a second, quickly shakes his head. "...Should we try it?" You must be crazy, Kim Ryeodam! What's there to try?! His earnest thoughts spill out of his mouth and his nervously blinking eyes open wide. As they look into each other's eyes, Jinwon's lips approach his cheek. What Ryeodam assumes to be Jinwon's thigh that's touching his is no thigh. Jinwon is hard.

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

altTitles.en: TODAG : Tales of Demons and Gods

description.en:
Nie Li became the strongest Demon Spiritualist and stood at the pinnacle of the martial world. However, he lost his life during the battle with the Sage-Emperor and six deity-ranked beasts.  
  
His soul was then brought back to when he was still 13 years old. At this point in his life, Nie Li was considered to be the most pathetic of his peers. However, with the vast knowledge he accumulated from his previous life (his future), he began becoming stronger faster than anyone could expect. He also decided to help those who died nobly in his previous life become stronger as well.  
  
Aiming to avert the future destruction of his home by demon beasts, and to avoid his previous fate of ending up destroyed, Nie Li fights to protect his lover, friends, family and fellow citizens who died in the beast assault or its aftermath. He also aims to destroy the so-called "sacred family," who will abandon their duty and betray the city.
description.ru: Сильнейший в мире заклинатель демонов Не Ли погиб в битве с Мудрецом-Императором. Но его душа воплотилась вновь, вернувшись на десятилетия назад, в нём самом, тринадцатилетнем подростке. Теперь у него есть шанс исправить все ошибки, совершённые в прошлом: спасти от монстров родной город, защитить любимую, друзей и семью. В детстве Не Ли был самым слабым учеником в классе, имея духовную силу на уровне простых людей. Он и мечтать не смел стать воином, не говоря уже о заклинателе демонов, но опыт и знания, накопленные в предыдущей жизни, помогут ему стать сильнее. Ведь сейчас он знает то, что неведомо профессорам в их боевой академии.
description.es-la: Nie Li, el más fuerte Espiritista Demoníaco, en su vida pasada estuvo en la cima del mundo marcial, sin embargo, perdió la vida durante la batalla con el Sabio Emperador y sus bestias, al morir fue devuelto al pasado cuando tenía 13 años gracias a la ayuda del Libro Temporal del Demonio Espiritual y aunque en este momento él es el más débil de su clase con la ayuda de los vastos conocimientos que acumuló de su vida anterior, se transformara en un guerrero formidable.
description.pt-br: Nie Li, o mais poderoso Espiritualista Demoníaco e estando no topo do mundo marcial, perde sua vida durante a batalha com o Imperador Sábio e as seis bestas de nível divino, e sua alma volta ao passado para quando ele tinha 13 anos. Embora ele seja o mais fraco em sua classe, com o talento mais baixo no reino da alma Vermelho – o mais fraco dos reinos – com a ajuda de seu vasto conhecimento acumulado na sua vida passada, cresce mais rápido do que todos. Agora, ele irá tentar proteger a cidade que no futuro será invadida pelas bestas e que acabou sendo destruída, assim como sua amada, seus amigos e sua família que morreram pelo ataque das mesmas, e destruir a família Sagrada que abandonaram seus deveres e traíram a cidade em sua vida passada.

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en:
Cat Paradise  
  
Yumi enrolls at Matabi Academy for one reason: with permission, you can raise your cat there. After the entrance ceremony, a monster suddenly appears, endangering her and her new friend. Given a mysterious power, Yumi and her cat Kansuke stride into battle.

A dramatic story set in the past of Gensokyo, before the creation of the spell card rules, following around a young Reimu. Unofficial and non-canon. Published in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.

altTitles.th: Re:Monster ราชันชาติอสูร

description.en: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Rou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, goblin Rou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
description.pt-br: Tomokui Kanata reincarnou na raça mais fraca, a dos goblins e ganhou um novo nome, Rou, após ter morrido de forma infeliz. Entretanto, o goblin Rou preservou as lembranças de sua vida passada, ganhando uma evolução incomum, mas mantendo sua capacidade de ganhar habilidades por comê-los. Neste mundo alternativo de sobrevivência do mais forte, com o desenrolar dos acontecimentos, irá o grupo do goblins se tornarem os heróis deste mundo e o transformarem em um cenário totalmente diferente do habitual? Ele irá se tornar o herói deste mundo ou um soberano das trevas dominará a todos?

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

description.en:
"O, Hero!", with that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure -did not begin. After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?   
A revolutionary transferred-to-another-world administrative fantasy series starts here!
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

title.en: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu

altTitles.ja: 学園物の乙女ゲームの世界に転生したけど、チート持ちの背景男子生徒だったようです。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我似乎在學園主題的乙女遊戲世界中轉生，但我是一個有外掛的背景男子學生。

altTitles.en: It Seems that I was Reincarnated into the World of a School Otome Game, but I was a Background Male Student with Cheats.

description.en: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.

title.en: Yandere Senior VS Tsundere Girlfriend! But I'm Just Here to Game!

altTitles.en: Obviously It's Just Gaming, Please Don't Involve Me in the Relationship Between Yandere Senpai and Tsundere Girlfriend

altTitles.zh: 明明只是打游戏，请不要把我卷入病娇学姐和傲娇女友的恋爱修罗场

description.en: First, I picked up a white-haired yandere who's the No. 1 Player in the world. Then, a blonde girlfriend who's the ace of a professional team fell into my lap. I'm just helping my sister with the game, so why am I being dragged onto this battlefield of love?!

Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

title.en: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

altTitles.vi: Ma cà rồng Beru và Hồn ma Aki

description.en: Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?
(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

description.fr: Le prochain directeur de l'hôtel Woo Myung-sung a été élevé comme "œuvre d'art" par son père. Myong-sung, qui semblait parfait sous tous les aspects, était en fait en train de perdre sa motivation à vivre, épuisé par la pression qu'il avait endurée depuis son enfance. Puis un jour, Woo Myung-sung a rencontré un camarade du lycée qui distribuait du poulet. Je veux transmettre mes compétences en rendez-vous à Jeonsu, qui se réveille comme une poupée qu'il aime, change d'humeur et révèle honnêtement toutes ses émotions comme un idiot. "Essaye, embrasse, apprends."

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en:
Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

description.en:
Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.
description.pt-br:
Izumo é um dos melhores alunos da escola e de aparência assustadora. Todo mundo tem medo dele, mas, na verdade, ele só quer amigos e uma vida escolar divertida. Um dia, ele é visado por uma súcubo chamada Anastasia, que tenta roubar sua alma virgem.

NOTA: Isto é um reboot da obra com arte aprimorada, mas com a história semelhante à da versão anterior.

description.de:
Als die sechsjährige Inés zum ersten Mal den gut aussehenden Erben von Haus Escalante erblickt, macht sie den Jungen direkt zu ihrem Verlobten. Da alle adeligen Männer bekanntlich gleich sind, dachte sie, sie könnte auch gleich einen gut aussehenden wählen. Aber der kleine Lord Cárcel ist noch nicht bereit für diese Art von Verpflichtung und verbringt die nächsten 15 Jahre damit, die Heirat um jeden Preis zu vermeiden. Glücklicherweise ist das kein Problem für Inés, da das Scheitern ihrer Ehe genau das ist, was sie will. Tatsächlich gibt sie ihm sogar ihren Segen dafür, sich auszutoben, solange er sich nicht in ihre Angelegenheiten einmischt. Leider macht es nicht so viel Spaß, ein Playboy zu sein, wenn die Verlobte einem die Erlaubnis dazu gibt. Und bedeutet das nicht, dass sie ihn auch betrügt? Und so entschließt sich Cárcel, Inés’ Meinung über ihn zu ändern und zu beweisen, dass er der Ehemann sein kann, den sie immer wollte.

---

description.en:
When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.

---

description.fr:
Lorsque la jeune Inés pose ses yeux sur l'héritier de la famille Escalante du haut de ses six ans, elle n'hésite pas un instant avant de demander à ce qu'il soit son fiancé. Comme les hommes nobles sont tous les mêmes, autant en choisir un beau, pas vrai? Mais le seigneur Cárcel n'est pas du genre fidèle, et il aimerait bien esquiver ce mariage... seulement, lorsque quelques années plus tard, il apprend qu'Inés se fiche bien de son amour et de sa fidélité après leur union, et qu'elle n'est pas éprise de lui comme il le pensait, Cárcel réalise qu'il n'était pas si désintéressé qu'il ne l'aurait cru. Il décide donc de prouver à sa future femme qu'il peut être un époux digne d'elle... sans se douter une seconde de ce qui avait bien pu pousser Inés à le choisir ainsi lorsqu'ils étaient enfants...

---

Dia bilang setelah kami menikah nanti, aku bahkan bisa lebih bebas daripada saat ini? Omong kosong macam apa itu? Dia bahkan memperbolehkanku untuk berkencan dengan wanita mana pun? Dia adalah seorang Duchess Escallante yang tidak tinggal bersama dengan Duke Escallante. Dia tidak butuh pria yang baik hati, melainkan pria yang suatu saat bisa disingkirkan dari kehidupannya secara hukum. Tapi sayang sekali, aku, Duke Escallante, tidak akan membiarkan hal itu terjadi. Aku tidak tertarik dengan kebebasan yang kau tawarkan. "Aku memang seorang bajing*n, tapi aku lebih setia daripada yang kamu bayangkan, Ines Valeztena."

Inés non aveva bisogno di un marito normale, ma di un uomo che un giorno sarebbe stato legalmente rimosso dalla sua vita . description.uk:
Шестирічна Інес звертає увагу на красеня-спадкоємця дому Ескаланте та оголошує його своїм нареченим. Оскільки усі знатні чоловіки для неї однакові, вона подумала, що могла хоча би вибрати гарненького. Але лорд Карсель ще не готовий до такого роду зобов’язань. Він проводить наступні півтора десятиліття, уникаючи шлюбу за будь-яку ціну!
На щастя, для Інес це не проблема, оскільки фіаско цього заміжжя — це саме те, чого вона хоче. Таким чином Карсель отримує благословення на походеньки, допоки він не втручається у її бізнес.
Та, на жаль, бути плейбоєм не так весело, коли ваша наречена дає вам дозвіл. І чи не означає це, що вона теж йому зраджує? Тепер Карсель налаштований змінити думку Інес про нього і довести, що він може бути чоловіком, якого вона завжди хотіла.

憨憨海王只想做禁欲姐姐的狗。 波澜不惊常年面瘫脸的伊娜丝小姐，执意要嫁给除了脸一无是处的海王卡西·凯特 是因为爱吗？ 本以为只是名存实亡的婚姻，没想到曾经的海王竟完全沦陷，疯狂贴贴！ 只是心态如古井般平静的她会被幼稚狗勾的猛烈攻势打动吗？

description.pt-br:
“Me casei com o maior gostosão da sociedade para então me divorciar e finalmente poder ser livre.”

Quando Inês de 6 anos colocou seus olhos no lindo herdeiro da Casa Escalante, ela logo o fez seu noivo. Já que homens nobres são todos iguais, ela imaginou que poderia pelo menos escolher um bonito. Mas lorde Cassel ainda não estava pronto para esse tipo de compromisso, e passou uma década e meia evitando o casamento de todo jeito! Felizmente, isso não era problema para a Inês, porque a falha neste casamento era exatamente o que ela queria. Na verdade, ele tinha a permissão dela para fazer o que quisesse, contanto que ficasse fora dos assuntos pessoais dela. Infelizmente, ser um playboy não é divertido quando se tem a permissão da esposa. E isso não significa que ela o está traindo também? Agora, Cassel está determinado a mudar a ideia que Inês tem na cabeça sobre ele e provar que ele pode ser o marido que ela sempre quis.

---

description.en:
‘Less than a month old… I became the great empire’s treasured princess…!’
In all my life, I wanted love. Love from my family, But the family I had, failed me in the end. Abandoned… abused… I don’t want this so-called family. It’s a waste of time.
I came to a new world after a miserable ending…
‘The empire’s treasured princess… that’s me… but why is father, the emperor, so strange?’
“Mabel, I will give you the Ponce Castle.”
“My sweet child, the most fertile land is yours.”
“No, wait, this whole country will be yours for the plucking.”
‘Father, he’s strange… is this what family love is like?
description.ru:
Мне 1 год, а меня уже называют Императрицей этой Империи?!
Когда я открыла глаза, поняла, что переродилась в истории с печальным концом в семье, где не может быть согласия или любящих родителей. Я переродилась принцессой!

description.en: New life love with a quirky guy she met at the share house she moved into, and the cohabitation romance begins....

title.en: A Single Aristocrat Enjoys a Different World: The Graceful Life of a Man Who Never Gets Married

altTitles.ja-ro: Dokushin Kizoku wa Isekai wo Ouka Suru ~Kekkon Shinai Otoko no Yuuga na Ohitori-sama Life~

altTitles.ja: 独身貴族は異世界を謳歌する ～結婚しない男の優雅なおひとりさまライフ～

altTitles.id: Bangsawan Lajang Yang Menikmati Hidup di Dunia Lain

description.en:
Toshinori Dokuraba, 35 years old. A so-called single aristocrat in Japan who enjoyed a single life without wife and children, even though he was tall, handsome, highly educated and had a high income. One day, he died alone at home.

However, he was liked by Hitorigami, the God of another world, and was able to reincarnate in that world. Reborn as Zirc Louren with skills and blessings from the God, he lived a new rosy life in a different world - then he turned 28 years old and enjoyed the single life again...

This is a story about the life of a single aristocrat who never gets married even if he reincarnates in another world.

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife
I Found a Female Knight in a Rice Field, in the Countryside They Think She’s My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

A slow life in the countryside begins with a beautiful female knight!

(Source: Magazine Pocket)

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10528/episode/349125) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

title.en: Stalker Otoko ga Sukina Onna no Ko no Himitsu wo Shiru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ストーカー男が好きな女の子の秘密を知る話
